Package com.example.eventapp.utils

Class FirestoreEmulator

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventapp.utils.FirestoreEmulator
public class FirestoreEmulator extends Object
FirestoreEmulator provides singleton access to Firestore instances configured for use with a local emulator, along with test instances of various repositories. This utility class ensures that Firestore settings are set to interact with the emulator rather than live Firestore, enabling efficient testing and development. This class includes methods to retrieve singleton instances of repositories for testing purposes, each configured to use the emulator instance.
